extendedInfo.description: Bright House Networks Home Security and Automation is a new home management system that provides next-generation home security, comfort, control, automation and energy management. With the Bright House Networks Security and Automation Application, you can remotely access and control your system from anywhere a data connection exists. (Note: you must be a Bright House Networks Home Security and Automation customer to use this application.)You can: - View your overall system and connectivity state- Arm and disarm your system - View status of individual zones (open, closed, low battery, temperature, etc.) - View live camera feeds- View event history by date and event type- View and control connected thermostat(s) settings for cooling and heating- Control installed lighting devicesNote: The application features may vary depending on the devices installed in your home.

reviews.title: Spotty
reviews.comment: Its 2:24pm on 8-28. Your remote aaaccess has been down for 3 hours. Impossible to turn on or off away from home. Net connection is fine.
reviews.author: dan s

reviews.title: Works great but..
reviews.comment: Response time on temperature control needs improvement.
reviews.author: Raymond Fernandez

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Super easy to use, I always use my phone now. Was nice to be able to check up on our house while we were in Jamaica on vacation.
reviews.author: Melissa Cockcroft

reviews.title: Great feature
reviews.comment: Def like being able to make sure everyone armed the system when they leave. Pull it up once I get to work and there it is. Agent on the phone helped me setup emails to alert me when its disarmed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great on my Samsung Infuse, loving my BHN Home Security so far & it includes cellular backup!
reviews.author: Aaron Field

reviews.title: Great when it works
reviews.comment: I used this app on my old iphone and now on my galaxy s3 and i experience the same problems. The app will say that there are doors open which are closed and locked, time out errors, or \"warning command failed to execute\" error. So annoying!
reviews.author: Kelly H

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: It\'s great when it works, it\'s too bad it only works 1 out of every 20 tries, if even that many.I keep getting could not connect to sever try again later.like I have all day to try to arm my house!!!!
reviews.author: Alfredo Ventura

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Apparently some people are using this app on devices that aren\'t really supported, not the apps fault.....it does allow you to arm away, arm stay, and arm night. The video is a little laggy (just a few seconds), but what do you expect connecting over a network, right? No complaints!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than ADT
reviews.comment: good app, love it on my Samsung S3...video lags about 6 seconds and video is choppy, like the ability to access system but the app has a lot of room for improvement. Would like to have it on my Toshiba Thrive but not available yet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What about the droid tablets?
reviews.comment: Very disappointed that this app is not geared for android tablets. Bright house needs to produce an HD version of this app quick for droid tablets.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says it does
reviews.comment: Good app Bhn
reviews.author: RJ Velez

reviews.comment: Bright House is a awesome provider and have had no issues with the app. Ty! \n\nHTC Desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ppl
reviews.comment: Graaaaat!!!!!!
reviews.author: arash shemirani

reviews.title: I really enjoyed the app untill...
reviews.comment: Used to watch what I liked when I stepped outside for a smoke until I lost the access to the selection part. Now all I get is AETV and no scrolling of options!
reviews.author: Wesley Ellison

reviews.title: Toshiba 10.1
reviews.comment: Love the app on my S 3. Wish it would work on my Toshiba 10.1 tablet.... other than that it is great. Does what it says
reviews.author: Anderson Chris

reviews.title: BHN security app
reviews.comment: Does not allow arm or disarm, cannot connect to server 95% of the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Is not compatible with tablets

reviews.comment: What next great
